success.emailVerified: Email is verified. You can close this tab and continue to create your account.
success.locationVerified: Location is verified. You can close this tab and continue to log in.
success.passwordChanged: Your password is changed. All your sessions and accesses are terminated. Please log in.

error.username&emailUsed: Username and email are already in use.

info.confirmSignup: Mail is sent. Please check inbox or spam folder to finish creating your account. You can close this tab.
info.newLocation: A new location is detected. Please check inbox or spam folder to verify your location, then try again.
info.changeEmail: Mail is sent. Please check inbox or spam folder to change your email.
info.changePassword: Mail is sent. Please check inbox or spam folder to change your password.

requirements.usernameChars: Use letters (a-z or A-Z), digits (0-9), dot (.), and underscore (_).
